# STATS::PLAYSTATS_HUB_EXIT

## Summary
Triggers after the player exits a social hub (music studio and smoking room to begin with, can expand for rest of hubs covered by HUB_ENTRY later, if needed)

## Parameters
* **STRUCT_HUB_EXIT\*** data
